subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: It’s no secret that the Clippers will pick Oklahoma forward Blake Griffin, but after that who goes where remains a mystery. Here is how one Western Conference executive forecast the first 11 picks.
snippet: It’s no secret that the Clippers will pick Oklahoma forward Blake Griffin, but after that who goes where remains a mystery. Here is how one Western Conference executive forecast the first 11 picks.
